description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Venatio Creo is a game development platform designed to give non-programmers the ability to create interactive video games. It utilizes a WYSIWYG interface that allows users to build their games without written scripting or compiling.
description.short: Venatio Creo is a game development platform designed to give non-programmers the ability to create interactive video games. It utilizes a WYSIWYG interface that allows users to build their games without written scripting or compiling.
